title: Rank size rule and primate cities

content.question: Which of the following occurs when the cities in a country follow the rank-size rule?

choices.label: There are two large cities with similar population sizes.
The largest city is two times the population of the next-largest city.
The largest city is three times the population of the next-largest city.
The largest city is four times the population of the next-largest city.
The largest city is five times the population of the next-largest city.

content.answer: The largest city is two times the population of the next-largest city.
